definition: to develop/to evolve/to practice/to perform/to play/to act
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: Safety measures co-evolve with the development of the technology.
sentences.chinese: 安全措施與技術的發展共同演化。

sentences.english: Diagnoses a clade or monophyletic group.
sentences.chinese: 判斷一個演化支或單源羣。

sentences.english: The paper also discusses the structural evolution history of the forel…
sentences.chinese: 並討論了龍門山中段中生代前陸盆地的構造演化歷史。

sentences.english: Eventually, such a system will evolve further with the death of the remaining supergiant star.
sentences.chinese: 最終這樣的系統會進一步演化到剩餘巨星的死亡。

sentences.english: The cometary ejection play a crucial role in formation and evolution of the meteoroid stream.
sentences.chinese: 彗星的噴發速度在流星羣的演化過程中起着重要作用。

sentences.english: Protected in a contract, the system will eventually evolve into knowledge-sharing.
sentences.chinese: 在有契約保障下，系統最終會演化爲知識共享。

sentences.english: Perhaps much like the stony troggs or dwarves that evolved from the earthen.
sentences.chinese: 這與由土靈演化出矮人與石齶怪非常相似。

sentences.english: As applications evolve over time, they often become less space -efficient.
sentences.chinese: 應用程序隨着時間演化，它們常常變得不夠緊湊。

sentences.english: Water and soil loss is an important landforms evolution course.
sentences.chinese: 水土流失其實是一種主要的侵蝕地貌演化過程。

sentences.english: Obviously, a line of astroid nebula is a result which the star old age evolves.
sentences.chinese: 可見，行星狀星雲是恆星晚年演化的結果。

sentences.english: The coevolution between life and the earth's environment is the core of geobiology.
sentences.chinese: 生命與地球環境的協同演化是地球生物學的核心。

sentences.english: Freeland earned his Ph. D. in evolutionary theory at the University of Cambridge.
sentences.chinese: 傅利蘭在英國劍橋大學取得博士學位，主攻演化理論。

sentences.english: K2O content and variation reflect the evolution of the rock and K-metasomatism.
sentences.chinese: 鉀質高低及變化可反映岩石演化程度和鉀交代作用。

sentences.english: Sorting out this story seems important for understanding the local landscape evolution.
sentences.chinese: 看起來梳理這個故事對理解當地景觀演化很重要。

sentences.english: The physical mechanism and the evolution of quantum wave function in time-domain are studied.
sentences.chinese: 分析了波函數的演化規律和系統極化強度的關係。

sentences.english: Enterprise clarifies, cuts through, and captures, the essence of the evolutionary spirit.
sentences.chinese: 進取心可以釐清一切，披荊斬棘直搗演化的精髓。

definition: to evolve (of ideas, designs, constructions etc)/to develop and change
to deduce/to infer/an implication/same as 推演
(of insects) to undergo metamorphosis/(fig.) to be transformed/to metamorphose/to become degraded
to form a cohesive whole/to fuse together
